fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align
Interface TagPositionConsumer.AnnotationReceiver

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaggedTextAligner.TagPositionWriterConsumer
Enclosing class:
TagPositionConsumer
public static interface TagPositionConsumer.AnnotationReceiver

Interface to communicate with the actual final consumer, which knows what to do with the annotations. Remark: addUnannotatedToken is never called if requiresUnannotatedTokens is false.

Author:
moreau
